thread.section_title: Hotel Pulitzer Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A gem of a place
thread.title_full: A gem of a place - Review of Hotel Pulitzer Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Des B
title: A gem of a place
text:
We loved it here, we booked a 4 night break , the hotel is love.y the staff form breakfast staff to reception to domiciliary staff were all friendly and extremely helpful. The hotel is brilliantly decorated. The food in the restaurant was good, having said that our farewell meal was the same order as the first night and it has to be said wasn't that nice. On the whole a great stay you can be in the centre of Rome in 20 mins with metro 2 mins away.we are planning the same trip next year and will be back.
Thank you
Des
